dlentry.dt: Why isn't the reading data from my new partition?
dlentry.dd: If you create a new partition in the Kafka topic, to launch a new worker to read from the partition, you need to restart the pipeline.

conbody.draft-comment: 1) Why cannot I start my pipeline in cluster mode: a) "sdc.execution.mode" in sdc.properties is set to standalone: "VALIDATION_0072 - Data collector is in standalone mode, cannot run pipeline cluster mode" b) Most likely the Spark on YARN client configuration is not in place (it's not a gateway node) or not up to date. "Error starting application: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Process submitting the spark job is dead and couldn't retrieve the YARN application id" Unfortunately for now they will have to go to logs to debug this one. 2) My cluster pipeline was killed unexpectely To debug this one go to the application on the YARN RM gui page and look at the Spark App Master logs. 3) How long does it take to start a cluster pipeline? It depends on how busy your YARN cluster is but typical times are 30-90 seconds.
